# function inputs
observed data
samples in the form aray [samples X i] # if their dims are off from projection its their job to fix with [gett_i, getc_i] etc

Lets make these fake inputs here
```{r cars}
mu <- 1:10 %>% as.list
sd1 <- rnorm(10, 2, .5) %>% as.list
simulated_samps <- purrr::pmap(list(n = 100, mean = mu, sd = sd1), rnorm) %>% unlist
simulated_sampes_array <- array(simulated_samps, c(100, 10))

data <- rv_data %>% 
  dplyr::select(country_code, region_code, y)

```

```{r}

  
  
rv_quantile_df <- function(samples_si) {
  samples_df_si <- samples_si %>% as.data.frame
  probs <- c(.025, 0.1, .5, .9, .975) %>% list
  estimates_df_i5 <- list(samples_df_si, probs) %>% purrr::pmap_dfr(quantile)
  return(estimates_df_i5)
} 


```
